Sentence.sentence: They could buy unique souvenirs there to take back home.

Sentence.sentence: It's also pushing ahead in 2016 with an expansion of Bluemercury, the beauty chain it bought last year.

Sentence.sentence: This is really about trying to cut through the confusion that consumers have when they are buying a product and that businesses have when they are selling a product, said Jon Leibowitz, chairman of the commission.

Sentence.sentence: People don’t just go in a local grocery store and buy these supplements.

Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: For example, when asked whether they  would buy a new smartphone this year, only 48 percent said yes – a six-point drop from 2015.

Sentence.sentence: The video camera that one single mother bought for a special occasion, for example, is not much fun now.

Sentence.sentence: The solution: set priorities—add up the annual cost of each item, then consider what else you could buy with the same money.

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均含"购买"之意。
means: buy ： 普通日常用词，既可指日常随意购物也可指大的购买。
purchase ： 正式用词，指大宗购货或购买重要东西。无感情色彩，强调物品的购得。

example.en: You couldn't find a job. You couldn't buy one.
example.zh: 你找不到工作的，绝不可能找到。

example.en: From then on, I couldn't buy a good review.
example.zh: 从那以后，我就再也写不出好的评论来了。

sentences.en: Unable to find the book in this bookstore, he bought elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 这家书店找不到此书, 他到别处买去了。

sentences.en: My father bought a nice toy for me yesterday.
sentences.cn: 我爸爸昨天为我买了一个好玩具。

sentences.en: I bought it ready-made.
sentences.cn: 我买的是现成货。

sentences.en: Our victory was dearly bought.
sentences.cn: 我们的胜利是付出巨大的代价而获得的。

means.word_mean: 买进（或出售）的东西；购买

sentences.en: He made a buy of wheat last week.
sentences.cn: 上星期他做了一笔小麦的买卖。

sentences.en: Best buys of the week are carrots, which are plentiful and cheap.
sentences.cn: 本星期买胡萝卜最合算, 因为货源充足, 价格低廉。

means.word_mean: 相信（尤指不大可能的事） </seg>

data.mean: buy sth↔up 全部（或尽量）买下某物；收购

sentence.cn: 我明天去市场买我们需要的所有东西。
sentence.en: I'll go to the market tomorrow to buy all the things we'll need.
sentence.from: 2016年高考英语四川卷 听力 原文

sentence.cn: 收购价格也可能是个信号。
sentence.en: The purchase price could also be a signal that an established company is buying a new-born threat.
sentence.from: 2017年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

mean.mean: buy sth↔up 全部（或尽量）买下某物；收购

jx.jx_en_mean: To bribe in order to proceed without interference or be exempted from an obligation or from prosecution.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 买通：贿赂以图不受干扰地持续进行或免于某一责任或依法处理

jx.jx_en_mean: To purchase the entire stock, business rights, or interests of.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 买尽：买下全部货物、产权或利润

jx.jx_en_mean: To purchase all that is available of.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 全部买进：买下提供的所有东西

jx.jx_en_mean: purchase goods for stock; stock up with something
withdraw something at auction because it fails to reach the reserve price
jx.jx_cn_mean: （因拍卖品出价未达底价而）收回

jx.jx_en_mean: To increase the time available for a specific purpose
jx.jx_cn_mean: 赢取时间：增加用于某一目标的可用时间

lj.lj_ly: “A moderate recovery thus buys time for Congress and the Administration to whittle the deficit”(&b{G. David Wallace})
lj.lj_ls: “一项适中的补偿措施为国会和政府逐渐减少赤字赢得了时间”(&b{G.戴维·华莱士})

jx.jx_en_mean: To die, especially suddenly or violently.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 死亡：死亡，常指突发性地死亡或暴死

entry.def: If you buy something, you obtain it by paying money for it.

example.ex: He could not afford to buy a house...
They can now be bought fresh in supermarkets...
example.tran: 这些现在可以在超市买到新鲜的了。

entry.def: If you talk about the quantity or standard of goods an amount of money buys, you are referring to the price of the goods or the value of the money.

example.tran: 大约花3.5万英镑就能买到一所宜居的房子。

example.ex: If the pound's value is high, British investors will spend their money abroad because the pound will buy them more.
example.tran: 如果英镑升值，英国的投资家们就会向国外投资，因为这样英镑能买到更多的东西。

entry.def: If you buy something like time, freedom, or victory, you obtain it but only by offering or giving up something in return.
entry.tran: （争取或付出一定代价以）获得，赢得

example.ex: It was a risky operation, but might buy more time...
example.tran: 这是一次冒险的行动，但也许能赢得更多的时间。

example.ex: For them, affluence was bought at the price of less freedom in their work environment.
example.tran: 对他们来说，富足是以减少在工作场所的自由为代价才获得的。

entry.def: If you say that a person can be bought, you are criticizing the fact that they will give their help or loyalty to someone in return for money.

example.ex: Once he shows he can be bought, they settle down to a regular payment.
example.tran: 一旦他表现出可以被收买，他们就会定期向他行贿。

entry.def: If you buy an idea or a theory, you believe and accept it.

example.ex: I'm not buying any of that nonsense.

entry.def: If something is a good buy, it is of good quality and not very expensive.
entry.tran: 划算的东西；性价比高的商品

example.ex: This was still a good buy even at the higher price...
example.tran: 即使价格更高一些，这仍然很合算。

example.ex: S & G offers great buys on computer software. S & G
example.tran: 公司可提供性价比很高的电脑软件。

sentences.sentence: "she got a bargain at the auction"
"the stock was a real buy at that price"

means.word_mean: 1. obtain by purchase; acquire by means of a financial transaction;

sentences.sentence: "She buys for the big department store"

means.word_mean: 2. make illegal payments to in exchange for favors or influence;
3. acquire by trade or sacrifice or exchange;

sentences.sentence: "She wanted to buy his love with her dedication to him and his work"

means.word_mean: 5. be worth or be capable of buying;

sentences.sentence: "This sum will buy you a ride on the train"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  bycgan, of Germanic origin

sentences.cn: 如今五英镑买不到多少东西了。
sentences.en: Five pounds doesn't buy much nowadays.

sentences.cn: 他是收买不了的。
sentences.en: He can't be bought (= he's too honest to accept money in this way) .

sentences.cn: 她出了名，却牺牲了她的婚姻。
sentences.en: Her fame was bought at the expense of her marriage.

sentences.cn: 你可以称病，但我想他们不会相信的。
sentences.en: You could say you were ill but I don't think they'd buy it (= accept the explanation) .

sentences.cn: 她从不随大溜认为要想有魅力，就得瘦身。
sentences.en: She had never bought into the idea that to be attractive you have to be thin.

sentences.cn: 开发商们要把岛上的全部土地都买尽了。
sentences.en: Developers are buying up all the land on the island.

sentences.cn: 那件夹克确实买得很划算。
sentences.en: That jacket was a really good buy.

sentences.cn: 这个星期最便宜的是胡萝卜和卷心菜。
sentences.en: Best buys this week are carrots and cabbages.

sentences.cn: 这个圣诞节电脑游戏很畅销。
sentences.en: Computer games are a popular buy this Christmas.

sentences.cn: 他给我买了一件新外套。
sentences.en: He bought me a new coat.

sentences.cn: 他给我买了一件新外套。
sentences.en: He bought a new coat for me.

sentences.cn: 那件连衣裙你是在哪里买的？
sentences.en: Where did you buy that dress?

sentences.cn: 我从朋友那里花10英镑买来的。
sentences.en: I bought it from a friend for £10.

sentences.cn: 你要是想买辆新车的话，现在正是时候。
sentences.en: If you're thinking of getting a new car, now is a good time to buy.

sentences.cn: 我买了一辆二手车。
sentences.en: I bought my car second-hand.

sentences.cn: 他让孩子们接受花钱能买到的最好的教育。
sentences.en: He gave his children the best education that money can buy.

sentences.cn: 对他们来说，富足是以减少在工作场所的自由为代价才获得的。
sentences.en: For them, affluence was bought at the price of less freedom in their work environment.

sentences.cn: 一旦他表现出可以被收买，他们就会定期向他行贿。
sentences.en: Once he shows he can be bought, they settle down to a regular payment.

sentences.cn: 我才不信那些废话呢。
sentences.en: I'm not buying any of that nonsense.

sentences.cn: 即使价格更高一些，这仍然很合算。
sentences.en: This was still a good buy even at the higher price...

sentences.cn: 公司可提供性价比很高的电脑软件。
sentences.en: S & G offers great buys on computer software. S & G

sentences.cn: 这是一次冒险的行动，但也许能赢得更多的时间。
sentences.en: It was a risky operation, but might buy more time...

sentences.cn: 他买不起房子。
sentences.en: He could not afford to buy a house...

sentences.cn: 这些现在可以在超市买到新鲜的了。
sentences.en: They can now be bought fresh in supermarkets...

sentences.cn: 大约花3.5万英镑就能买到一所宜居的房子。
sentences.en: About £35,000 buys a habitable house...

sentences.cn: 如果英镑升值，英国的投资家们就会向国外投资，因为这样英镑能买到更多的东西。
sentences.en: If the pound's value is high, British investors will spend their money abroad because the pound will buy them more.

sentences.cn: 她向我借钱,以便可以买一双新鞋.
sentences.en: She put the bite on me so that she could buy a pair of new shoes.

sentences.cn: 没有生气的市场也在一定程度上表明，银行系统已经瘫痪。由于担心账面损失，银行既不会出售资产，也不愿购买那些所谓的廉价资产。
sentences.en: And dead markets partly reflect the paralysis of banks which will not sell assets for fear of booking losses, yet are reluctant to buy all those supposed bargains.

sentences.cn: 通过观察人们在网上搜索的内容、点击的链接和发表的言论，企业能针对最可能购买的人群投放“行为”广告。
sentences.en: By watching what people search for, click on and say online, companies can aim “behavioural"ads at those most likely to buy.

sentences.cn: 其次，消费者可能愿意购买某一公司的产品，以作为捐助该公司所涉公益事业的间接方式。
sentences.en: Second, customers may be willing to buy a company’s products as an indirect way to donate to the good causes it helps.

sentences.cn: 在设计师的陪同下一次性购买所有衣服，而不是自己去，一次仅买一件。【句子解析】本句是由“谓语(Buy) +宾语(all your clothes)”构成的祈使句，介词短语at once,with a stylist和instead of...均作状语。instead of...中，副同alone作状语，修饰动名词shopping。one article of clothing…补充说明shopping, 其中at a time 作状语，表频度。
sentences.en: Buy all your clothes once with a stylist instead of shopping alone, one article of clothing at a time.

sentences.cn: year, only 48 percent said yes – a six-point drop from 2015例如，当被问到今年是否会购买一部新的智能手机时，只有 48% 的消费者给出肯定回答——该比例相比 2015 年下降了 6 个百分点
sentences.en: For example, when  asked  whether  they  would  buy  a  new  smartphone  this

sentences.cn: 但实施这一计划需要提升投资人的信心，这得需要一些时间，而Rosen 说在这期间他还是得购买食物，每个月偿还房屋贷款。
sentences.en: But the boost in investor confidence needed for the plan to work will take time, time that Rosen says still requires him to buy food and make monthly mortgage payments.

sentences.en: When Congress passed the $ 700 billion bailout, the whole idea was to buy failed mortgage assets.

sentences.en: There is no obligation to buy.

sentences.cn: 奥, 你要做什么, 要买通休斯顿的所有头头 吗 ?
sentences.en: Well, what did you do, buy up all the control heads in Houston?

sentences.cn: 原来如此, 那我怎样才能买通你 呢 ?
sentences.en: I see. And how do I buy you off?

sentences.cn: 为了买通对手,我还需要暴君的实际战斗数据.
sentences.en: To buy into that opposing corporation I would need the actual combat data of the Tyrant.

sentences.cn: 我想买通海关官员.
sentences.en: I want to buy off the customs officers.

sentences.cn: 你可以买通他.
sentences.en: Yang : You can buy off him.

sentences.cn: 他是收买不了的。
sentences.en: He can't be bought (= he's too honest to accept money in this way) .

sentences.cn: 一旦他表现出可以被收买，他们就会定期向他行贿。
sentences.en: Once he shows he can be bought, they settle down to a regular payment.

sentences.cn: 敌人企图收买他.
sentences.en: The enemy tried to buy him over.

sentences.cn: 想收买我吗?恐怕你找错人了.
sentences.en: If you are trying to buy off, I'm afraid you've come to the wrong person.

sentences.cn: 她有需求, 但是任何男人也别指望用花言巧语或者小恩小惠来收买她.
sentences.en: She wanted something , but no man should buy her by false protestations or favour.
sentences.from: 英汉文学 - 嘉莉妹妹

sentences.cn: 所有这一切意在给中国货币收买一些地位.
sentences.en: All this is intended to buy China's currency some respectability.

sentences.cn: 其次, 尤素福认为他可以收买议会.
sentences.en: And second of all, he believes he can buy off parliament.

sentences.cn: 他们想收买他让他保持缄默(不泄露秘密).
sentences.en: They tried to buy his silence, ie to pay him not to reveal a secret.

sentences.cn: 这里的某个人, 我不会说出是谁, 要收买他.
sentences.en: Someone here, and l'm not gonna say who, offered to buy it.

sentences.cn: 本周巨蟹要克制自己不去收买某人的心.
sentences.en: Refrain from trying to buy your way into someone's heart.

sentences.cn: 他们企图收买他.
sentences.en: They tried to buy him over.

sentences.cn: 黑手党企图收买目击者.
sentences.en: The mafia attempted on buy off the witness.

sentences.cn: 而且象那些专家推荐的股票一般都是被庄给收买了.
sentences.en: And as the experts recommended the stock in general were to buy the Zhuang.

sentences.cn: 他总是先收买一个对继承遗产最没有希望的人.
sentences.en: It was his way to buy out the most unlikely claimant.

sentences.cn: 他们可能会想法收买你.
sentences.en: They may try to buy you over.

sentences.cn: 我们决不能牺牲股东的钱到社会上去收买廉价的好名声.
sentences.en: We must never buy easy popularity at Stockholder's expense.

sentences.cn: 敌人可以用钱来收买你.
sentences.en: The enemy may try to buy you over.

sentences.cn: 他们要收买你.
sentences.en: They try to buy you over.

sentences.cn: 他似乎以为出点钱就能收买我们.
sentences.en: He seems to think he can buy us over cneaply.

sentences.cn: 他们收买权贵, 让中国人民就范.
sentences.en: They buy over dignitaries as their agents , to slave the Chinese.

sentences.cn: 问: 电脑的AI是怎样起作用的? 我该怎么去收买他们?
sentences.en: Q: How does Police AI work? How do we buy them off?

sentences.cn: 金钱可以收买小人, 却不能收买真理.
sentences.en: Money can buy off a mean person, but it can never buy off truth.

sentences.cn: 杰姬鄙视那些她用钱就可以收买的奴仆。
sentences.en: Jackie disdained the servants that her millions could buy.

sentences.cn: 那个被告想贿赂法官.
sentences.en: The accused man tried to buy the judge off.

sentences.cn: 这贼企图贿赂警察, 但他未达到目的.
sentences.en: The thief tried to buy off the policeman, but he didn't succeed.

sentences.cn: 他以为我们是想通过贿赂进入他的公司。
sentences.en: He thought we were trying to buy our way into his company.

Sentence.sentence: More and more Britons buy recycled toilet paper to protect the environment.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In a challenge for manufacturers, 81% of paper product users said they would consider buying recycled toilet tissue if it were comparable in quality to standard paper.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Environmental protection is not much of a concern when Britons buy toilet paper.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Another trend that looks significant in 2015 is that America's largest population group, Millennials ( ' ,  千禧 一代), will continue to put off buying a house.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: After graduating with a degree in business and accounting, she joined a public accounting firm, married, bought a house, put lots of stuff in it, and had a baby.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Still, 60% of drivers would like to get some kind of self-driving feature, such as automatic braking or self-parking the next time they buy a new car.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Unable to buy grain or grow their own, hungry people take to the streets.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Since industrialization, maintaining such a slow cultural metabolism has been much harder, with the long midday meal shrinking to whatever could be stuffed into a lunch bucket or bought at a food stand.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Once driverless cars are actually for sale, the early adopters will be the people who can afford to buy them.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Food-import anxiety is even leading to new efforts by food-importing countries to buy or lease farmland in other countries.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: This boosts the local economy considerably because tourists not only buy crafts, but they also use the restaurants and hotels and other services of the area.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: If we buy food, we have to pay for it; if a doctor treats us, we know there will be a bill to pay.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: To those Americans for whom money is a concern, my advice is simple: Buy what you can afford, and cook it yourself.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: To eat well and still save money, people should buy fresh food and cook it themselves.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The kind of shopping—where you hand over notes and count out change in return—now happens only in the most minor of our retail encounters, like buying a bar of chocolate or a pint of milk from a corner shop.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Ask yourself, Would Grandma consider this food? Does it look like something that might occur in nature? It's pretty much common sense: you want to buy food, not unidentifiable foodlike objects.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A 16-year-old asked a stranger at a grocery store to buy him and his mother some food in exchange for carrying the man's groceries to his car.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月四级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: After new legislation demanded their removal from the roads, a low interest loan scheme was set up with three Egyptian banks so drivers could buy new cars.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月四级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: For the past several decades, it seems there's been a general consensus on how to get ahead in America: Get a college education, find a reliable job, and buy your own home.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月四级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: It's pretty much common sense: you want to buy food, not unidentifiable foodlike objects.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月四级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Members—including guys named Jobs and Wozniak—started making and inventing things they couldn't buy.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月四级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: This way, patients not only learn about which foods to buy, but also how to prepare them at home.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月四级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: When travelling overseas, do you buy water in plastic bottles or take your chances with tap water?
Sentence.come: 2019年12月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: You can buy lots of gorgeous Italian clothes.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section B
